name: Icebergs (HelperWesley)
description:
In this asteroids inspired game, you're tasked with crossing the ice filled waters of northern Canada in search of a missing coast guard ship.

You soon find out what might have happened to the other ship as you find yourself in a fight for survival against a creature of the sea.

____________________________________________________

This game was originally created in 48 hours for a game jam hosted by Vimlark

Original concept: Asteroids
Twist: Can't stop moving
Added mechanic: Bigger is better

_________________________________________
